title: Vote for the Ocean Week reinforcements!
body:
Hello Oceania!

This is your chance to have your say on which champions are going to come chill out on the beach during Ocean Week!

The two champs with the most votes will become Ocean Week champions, join the cause and be **put on free rotation for the duration of the challenge**.

You can find out more about Ocean Week here: [http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/community-events/ocean-week-coming](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/community-events/ocean-week-coming)

Voting ends 12:01pm Thursday 22nd of January.

GLHF

~~~~~~~~~
**UPDATE**: Voting has now closed!

**Caitlyn and Vi** are your winners with 2407 and 2331 votes respectively. They will join the free week rotation during Ocean Week and also contribute points when played!

replies.body: But... Imagine Seagull Valor
Seagull valor and Swim Suit Quin would be soo funny!
*Miiineee Miiineee Miiineee*
WHY DIDN'T YOU TELL ME THIS SOONER QMQ
WHERES THE BIKINI {{champion:6}}
Are we only allowed to pick one champ, not two? :o
One vote per person then the top two pack their bags and head down under!
pls Lulu Lulu
no wukong
so the top two most voted champs r free for the week?
Yeah, they will be free for Ocean Week and when played will contribute points towards the Ocean Week goals!
i get the feeling that if we could see what the champs looked like and in game character models for the pool party skins i dont think that cait and vi would be winning by a landslide
No in game models to show...cause there aren't new skins.
They are piltovers finest, we need them for the beach. {{champion:51}} {{champion:254}}
{{champion:154}}  In a speedo and blue, cmon who doesnt want to see him in a speedo
http://gisalmeida.deviantart.com/art/League-of-Legends-Pool-Party-Zac-488819619
Imagine wukong hitting people with a noodle.
Caitlyn and Vi, as they are already an item. :)
YES I AGREE FOR {{champion:51}} BUT NOT VI
*Stop thinking with your {{item:1058}}
Yep, I agree with that

Guys, I feel like I need to mention this since so many of you are bringing skins into it. No where has it said **ANYTHING** about the 'chosen' champs getting skins. In fact Sephyre has already commented on this. 
>You're choosing a champion to join the free week rotation during Ocean Week =)

>It does not have anything to do with skins.

You can find the post in question using [this link](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/gezgTskh-vote-for-the-ocean-week-reinforcements?comment=00580000).
^ I don't think people understand this

It's just a play on words - it's about Ocean Week.

You're choosing a champion to join the free week rotation during Ocean Week =)

It does not have anything to do with skins.
WHO SAID ANYTHING ABOUT SKINS. ITS JUST WHO WILL GO ON FREE WEEK
goin for mr.shen
dont u guys read... it never says there will be skins
Guys were not voting for who should get a skin just who should be free to play on ocean week... Nowhere does it say that they will get a skin.
theres no lee sin
Because he will be f2p anyway ;) just check the internet sides and u will read that
caitlyn and vi obviously.... even officers needs a break
i thought Vi{{champion:254}}  and Ezreal{{champion:81}}  because personally they're fun to play :3
Ezreals laser becomes a water gun attached to his arm
REPORT! XD
{{champion:254}} Vi for dayz ♥
It would be interesting to see what the two officers {{champion:254}} and {{champion:51}} get up to in their spare time :P
Pick a character that doesn't have much skins..

Ok people you need to understand that no skins will be made for these champs they are only going to be put into the weekly rotation for this week. But who knows maybe riot may consider making a skin based on one of the suggestions. (hint, hint :D)
Pls vote for Lulu. ☺️ It will be cool to see her with a new skin.
Absolutely nowhere does it say that skins are involved. Sephyre even said that this has nothing to do with skins.

stop voting for champs you own
its a free rotation vote

beach side zac
